settings.title: Made in America
settings.text: Since 1958, we have been bench-making our salon furniture and spa equipment here in the heart of Southern California.

settings.title: Rebuilding Our Community
settings.text: When you're ready, we'll be here.  We are ready to help you change your operation and return to your business.

settings.title: Ready to Ship
settings.text: With the one of the largest stock inventory, most of products ships with 3-5 business days directly to you.

settings.title: #1 Brand of Spa Equipment
settings.text: We aren't successful because of fancy magazine ads.  We built our business the old fashion way... we earned it.

settings.title: Our Commitment to the Salon Industry and Greater Community
Warranty
settings.text: We stand behind every product we make, and we are ready to help you get back to work.

settings.title: QUICK SHIP
settings.text: We have the biggest inventory, so we can ship it to you fast. No matter your order amount.

settings.title: The New American Classic
settings.subheading: Since 1958, we have made. We believe in sustainable growth across our industry by creating fewer, better products that are built to last.  And we've been standing behind every product we make with our industry-leading warranties.
settings.caption: We will work harder,  we will invest more, but we will never cut corners.  Invest in yourself and partner with an American salon and spa equipment and furnishing supplier that values its customers as much as you value your business.

settings.title: 2020 HOLIDAY SALE
settings.text: TIME TO MAKE THOSE UPGRADES BEFORE THE HOLIDAY RUSH
Cut color procesing time by nearly 40% with advance far-infrared heat technology, mobile rollerstand or space-saving wall-mount setup, and easy-to-use programmed settings.
PARAGON salon hair dryers are designed to deliver a high volume of air power to dry clients' hair quickly.
Back by popular demand, meet COLORWAVE our newest edition to PARAGON's line of Advance Far-Infrared Color Processor Accelerators

settings.title: PARAGON UVC SANITIZERS
settings.text: THE LEGENDARY PARAGON UVC SANTIZERS ARE BACK IN-STOCK AND READY TO SHIP TO ALL HOSPITALS, FIRST RESPONDERS, AND GERIATRIC FACILITIES.

settings.quote: Our color customers love our new 40B Shampoo System more than we do.  So customers aren't suppose to be drenched with their rinse outs?  I wish we had known about these earlier, but all the stylists are so happy we upgrade with these!

We used to buy the cheap stuff, but that really bit us in the ass because it just doesn't hold up. We ended up buying new stuff every year.  It was a vicious cycle.  That ended when we bought the Paragon steamers and cabis for all our locations.
I still have your 8000 machine from 25 years ago.  It still works beautifully, and I'm happy I can always get parts for it or send it in for service.

settings.title: WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING
settings.subtitle: We are proud of the products we make, but don't take our words for it.

settings.title: Comfort = Repeat Customers
settings.text: It's time to ditch your old shampoo bowl and pamper your high-margin color clients with ergonomic shampoo chairs and tilt-adjustable shampoo bowls. Invest the right shampoo chair and bowl for stylists' heights and the way you want operate.
